A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Star Wars The Last Jedi\, was an even bigger disappointment than The Force Awakens! The plot was full of holes\, Luke was reduced to a shell of his former self. Kylo is an even bigger whiney baby than he was before\, and still we have unanswered questions. Do yourself a favor\, and don't waste your money! I'm glad I had free tickets\, or I would really be upset!
